sid.description: The unique identifier for the trunk.

account_sid.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the trunk.

domain_name.description: The domain name associated with the trunk.

disaster_recovery_method.description: The method used for disaster recovery for this trunk.

disaster_recovery_url.description: The URL set up for disaster recovery in case of trunk failure.

friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name for the trunk.

secure.description: Indicates whether the trunk connection is secure.

cnam_lookup_enabled.description: Indicates whether Caller ID Name (CNAM) lookup is enabled for this trunk.

recording.description: Settings related to call recording on the trunk.

mode.description: The mode used for recording calls on this trunk.

trim.description: Indicates whether recorded calls should be trimmed.

transfer_mode.description: The mode used for call transfer on this trunk.

transfer_caller_id.description: The Caller ID used when transferring calls through this trunk.

auth_type.description: The authentication type used for this trunk.

auth_type_set.description: A set of authentication types associated with the trunk.

auth_type.description: The authentication type used for each item in the set.

date_created.description: The date and time the trunk was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time the trunk was last updated.

links.description: Links to related resources associated with the trunk.

origination_urls.description: Endpoint for managing origination URLs associated with the trunk.

credential_lists.description: Endpoint for managing credential lists associated with the trunk.

ip_access_control_lists.description: Endpoint for managing IP Access Control Lists (ACLs) associated with the trunk.

phone_numbers.description: Endpoint for managing phone numbers associated with the trunk.
